Metadata.Purpose: Provides structured lists of canonical entities within the Klark Kent universe, including institutions, locations, forms, statutes, and key concepts.
Metadata.Scope: Covers named entities referenced across KK materials essential for maintaining world consistency.
Metadata.UsageNote: Load this file when generating content that requires specific names of places, organizations, documents, or core ideas from KK's world.
Metadata.SourceDocuments: KK_TerminologyReference, KK_RegisterOne_Written-Official.md, KK_RegisterTwo_Spoken-Conversational.md, THE CODEX KINESIS, products.html, KK_Original_Sources_Archive.md, etc.

Entity.Name: Church of Kinetic Ritual
Entity.Description: Klark Kent's overarching metaphysical organization, promoting Kinetic Ritual.

Entity.Name: Intranodal Transit Authority
Entity.Description: Primary regulatory body overseeing rhythmadelic phenomena, issuing directives, handling compliance, audits, and registries. Also governs intranodal movement and communication.

Entity.Name: Council of Resonant Verification
Entity.Description: Authentication authority, approves methodologies like Vibrational Genealogy and diagnostic kits.

Entity.Name: Buttercup, Harlequin & Drood
Entity.Description: Klark Kent's longstanding attorneys, handling legal matters such as copyright enforcement (e.g., Lasagna Incident).

Entity.Name: Swiss Cottage Institute (for Anomalous Affairs/Phenomena)
Entity.Description: Research institute involved in verifying phenomena (e.g., post-Feynman-Kent incident) and conducting field tests (e.g., Qualia assessment).

Entity.Name: The Vatican’s Department of Suppressed Acoustics
Entity.Description: An alleged censorship authority mentioned in the Codex Kinesis foreword.

Entity.Name: Ritual Enforcement Officer(s)
Entity.Description: Personnel responsible for enforcing compliance and intervening in unsanctioned kinetic activity. Associated with specific uniforms/sigils.

Entity.Name: CKR Risogarphic Consortium
Entity.Description: Sanctioning body mentioned in relation to Kinetic Entrainment Tools.

Entity.Name: Thigher Mammalian Risograf Consortia
Entity.Description: Regulatory body mentioned in the webstore compliance notice.

Entity.Name: Office of Pineal Stability
Entity.Description: Office to which practitioners report positive Unauthorized Qualia self-assessments.

Entity.Name: Llandyckk
Entity.Description: Welsh village designated Primary Manifestation Locus Alpha. High baseline permeability, site of initial materialization and calibration. Also location of Rhythmic Rehabilitation Center.

Entity.Name: East Hendred
Entity.Description: Site of significant documented phenomena, including the 'Orgasmic Resonance Cascade' / 'Mass Ejaculation Event' and potentially a location for meditation ('cave beneath East Hendred').

Entity.Name: Fewcott (near Bicester)
Entity.Description: Location associated with underground research facility, sub-studies (e.g., Vibrational Genealogy), pineal research, and potentially an operational monitoring station.

Entity.Name: St. John’s Wood
Entity.Description: Location mentioned in original press release as site of KK performance/phenomena.

Entity.Name: Tyneside
Entity.Description: Location mentioned in original press release (Barclays Bank clerk experience).

Entity.Name: Château de Marouatte
Entity.Description: Location mentioned in original terminology reference.

Entity.Name: Swiss Cottage
Entity.Description: Likely location of the Swiss Cottage Institute.

Entity.Name: Bicester
Entity.Description: Town near Fewcott, used for geographical context.

Entity.Name: Form KK-137B
Entity.Description: Regulation documentation form (e.g., for documenting band activities). Also associated with Field Documentation Unit and operator certification standards.

Entity.Name: Form RF-12
Entity.Description: Form for logging "Anomalous Reception Events" during transcription.

Entity.Name: Form PS-SPEC-L3
Entity.Description: Specifies conditions under which perspiration exhibits trace phosphorescence.

Entity.Name: Form RF-9B
Entity.Description: Secure form for reporting positive Unauthorized Qualia Self-Assessment to the Office of Pineal Stability.

Entity.Name: Form CRV-ACCESS-PINEAL
Entity.Description: Form required for accessing documented results on Pineal Maintenance Apparatus efficacy via secure ITA portal.

Entity.Name: Form HGR-7
Entity.Description: Compliance form related to "Hygienic Resonance Protocols," simplified by wearing gloves.

Entity.Name: Form ID-7734
Entity.Description: Form referenced for external application of Pineal Maintenance kit solution. Also mentioned as Interdimensional Visa Application form.

Entity.Name: Form HMRS-WS-01
Entity.Description: Designation for the Mandatory Operational Hazard Display Unit (Hazard Identification Chart).

Entity.Name: Form LT-27/B
Entity.Description: Manufacturing specification form for the 'Torpedo' Operator Designation Garment.

Entity.Name: Form Q-17
Entity.Description: "Involuntary Entrainment Manifestation Report" form for logging NVODS-triggering anomalies.

Entity.Name: Form UQ-Checklist 7
Entity.Description: Designation for the Mandatory Personnel Well-being Assessment Chart (Unauthorized Qualia Self-Assessment).

Entity.Name: Form RF-4C.217
Entity.Description: Designation for the Regulation Technical Reference Chart: Emotion Beam Trajectory Dynamics.

Entity.Name: Form RF-78/3C
Entity.Description: Reference code appearing in webstore footer.

Entity.Name: Requisition Code
Entity.Description: Standard identifier for products/tools in the COKR Asset Catalogue (e.g., TOOL-PDK-001, DIAG-RSA-VG1).

Entity.Name: Reference Code/ID
Entity.Description: Identifier for documents, accords, or catalogue items (e.g., KK-IDA-001, Ref: CKR-LP-SP-v3.141, Reference ID: 4881-317).

Entity.Name: Case file BH&D-78-003
Entity.Description: The official record of the 'Lasagna Incident' legal proceedings.

Entity.Name: Resonate Reception Protocol
Entity.Description: Governs musical transcription.

Entity.Name: ITA Directive 77G
Entity.Description: Relates to post-calibration for transcription.

Entity.Name: Initial Deployment Accords
Entity.Description: Established Llandyckk as Primary Manifestation Locus Alpha (Ref: KK-IDA-001).

Entity.Name: Seminal Vibrational Discharge Protocol
Entity.Description: Governs physiological events during performance.

Entity.Name: Intranodal Transit Authority Compact
Entity.Description: Establishes the Intranodal Transit Authority (specifically Section IV).

Entity.Name: Procedural Guideline PG-FB-004 ("Audience Resonance Analysis")
Entity.Description: Governs the logging of audience feedback.

Entity.Name: Self-Correction Protocol SCP-KK-01
Entity.Description: Mandates periodic internal audits.

Entity.Name: Copyright statute on the 'Ave Maria-Kent Variant'
Entity.Description: Legal basis for the 'Lasagna Incident' lawsuit.

Entity.Name: ITA Syllabus 4D
Entity.Description: Relates to the details of Syncopational Privileges.

Entity.Name: ITA Directive 101
Entity.Description: Consulted when starting bands, if indicated by DIAG-RSA-VG1 kit.

Entity.Name: Interdimensional Materialization Protocol
Entity.Description: Governs manifestation and dormancy periods (e.g., Statute 7B). Note: Contains 'Interdimensional' but seems canonical to the name.

Entity.Name: Statute 7B
Entity.Description: Section of the Interdimensional Materialization Protocol. Also cited regarding unauthorized possession/impersonation and distribution of classified info.

Entity.Name: Autorhythmic Safety System KK-317
Entity.Description: Referenced in Hazard Identification Chart notice regarding consequences of failing to recognize hazards.

Entity.Name: ITA Directive 88K
Entity.Description: Governs issuance of the REO Operational Outer Garment.

Entity.Name: Non-Voluntary Ontological Disclosure Scheme
Entity.Description: System triggered by reporting anomalies, mentioned in webstore footer.

Entity.Name: Unified Oscillatory Interpretability Framework
Entity.Description: System for retroactively classifying qualia, mentioned in webstore footer.

Entity.Name: Provisional Emotion Beam Mandate
Entity.Description: Authority for subliminal internodal monitoring, mentioned in webstore footer.

Entity.Name: Data Resonance Integrity Mandate DRIM-04
Entity.Description: Governs passive monitoring of operational rhythmadelic signatures.

Entity.Name: REO Protocol Gamma-7
Entity.Description: Governs Ritual Enforcement intervention for unauthorized replication/dissemination.

Entity.Name: Temporal Integrity Statute 4C.317
Entity.Description: Violated by unauthorized access to restricted portals.
